ImplementedSecurityControls.Credit Check: The if (oCredit > 0) condition prevents the contract from attempting withdrawals for zero or negative balances.

KnownVulnerabilities.Reentrancy: The withdrawAll function lacks a reentrancy guard and thus is vulnerable to reentrancy attacks.

SecurityMeasuresAndExistingProtections.FallbackFunctionality: No fallback function is specified in this contract.
